text:
="preserve">Nina Ivanova (6 January 1934 – 1 December 2020) was a Russian-Soviet actress. She was born in Moscow. Ivanova's career began in 1944. Her best known roles were in "Once There Was a Girl" (1944), "Spring on Zarechnaya Street" (1956), "An Easy Life" (1964) and "There Is Such a Lad" (1964).
Ivanova died on 1 December 2020 in Moscow at the age of 86.
